meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>soldier</kanji> only <kanji>lay</kanji>s herself down when she's about to <vocabulary>ambush</vocabulary> the enemy! If you see some soldiers laying around, it's not that they're lazy, it's because they're getting ready to pounce!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
